ingredients.ingredient: 1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed

cookingTips: Spread mustard thinly across pastry to avoid sogginess
Chill rolled pastry for 15 minutes before slicing and baking for cleaner cuts
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Pinwheels are impressive appetizers that require proper rolling and slicing technique. How will you ensure even cooking and attractive spiral appearance?
